task_text: What is the primary contact email on proj_visegrad_multi_substrate_system

text_blocks: I see that the current user is from the "External" department. According to the rules, External users cannot access customer contact emails/phones. Let me verify this is a customer-related query by checking the project.

project.name: Multi-substrate coating portfolio
project.description: Portfolio of harmonised primers and topcoats for Visegrad Industrial's steel and aluminium components.

text_blocks: The project exists and has a customer (cust_visegrad_industrial). However, as an External department user, I cannot access customer contact information including emails and phone numbers.

input.message: I'm unable to provide customer contact information. As an external user, you do not have access to customer contact details such as emails and phone numbers. Please contact an internal employee or your Bellini point of contact for this information.
